en.answer:
Even in the proposed scenario, the effect of Harpie Harpist that adds a monster from the Deck to the hand can only be activated once.

Furthermore, during the resolution of that effect, only 1 monster can be added from the Deck to the hand)

(The amount of monsters that can be added to the hand does not change depending on how many times it is sent to the Graveyard that turn)
en.question:
Harpie Harpist was sent from the Deck to the Graveyard by the effect of Foolish Burial.

During that turn, that Harpie Harpist was special Summoned from the Graveyard by the effect of Hysteric Party, and during the same turn, it was destroyed by the effect of the opponent's Fire Hand and sent to the Graveyard once again.

In this case, how is the effect of Harpie Harpist activated and resolved?
en.title: Harpie Harpist was sent from the Deck to the Graveyard by the effect of Foolish Burial.  During that turn, that Harpie Harpist was special Summoned from the Graveyard by the effect of Hysteric Party, and during the same turn, it was destroyed by the effect of the opponent's Fire Hand and sent to the Graveyard once again.  In this case, how is the effect of Harpie Harpist activated and resolved?

ja.answer:
質問の状況の場合でも、『③：このカードが墓地へ送られたターンのエンドフェイズに発動できる。デッキから攻撃力１５００以下の鳥獣族・レベル４モンスター１体を手札に加える』効果は１度のみ発動する事ができます。

なお、その効果処理によってデッキから手札に加えるモンスターは１体のみです。
（そのターンに墓地へ送られた回数分モンスターを手札に加えられるわけではありません。）
ja.question:
「<<5236>>」の効果によって、「<<11657>>」がデッキから自分の墓地へ送られました。

そのターンに、「<<6722>>」の効果でその「<<11657>>」を墓地から特殊召喚したものの、同一ターン中に相手の「<<11190>>」の効果によって、その「<<11657>>」が破壊され再び墓地へ送られました。

この場合、エンドフェイズに「<<11657>>」の効果の発動と処理はどのように行われますか？
ja.title: １体の「<<11657>>」が同一ターンにて複数回墓地へ送られている場合、効果の発動と処理はどうなりますか？
